title: On affine Riemann surfaces
abstract:
We show that the universal covering space of a connected component of a
regular level set of a smooth complex valued function on ${\mathbb{C}}^2$,
which is a smooth affine Riemann surface, is ${\mathbb{R}}^2$. This implies
that the orbit space of the action of the covering group on ${\mathbb{R}}^2$ is
the original affine Riemann surface.
